attributes.action: fathers hiding income to stop paying child maintenance
attributes.additional_details:
The father of ny chikdren works 70 hours a week for his girlfriend but does it all for free so he doesnt have to pay child maintenance,  but she pays him cash in hand, I can claim 2.50 per child per week under the csa rules, this needs to change,
I want the government to look at how this is acceptable

rejection.details: This is correspondence on a personal issue
